00028 void
00029 Smpp::SmeAddress::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff, Smpp::Uint32 len)
00030 {
00031     if(len < 3)
00032         throw Smpp::Error("Invalid SmeAddress length");
00033 
00034     const Smpp::Uint8* t = buff;
00035     ton_ = t[0];
00036     npi_ = t[1];
00037     const Smpp::Char* s = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00038     addr_ = s+2;
00039 }
00040 
00044 void Smpp::MultiDestinationAddresses::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff, Smpp::Uint32 len)
00045 {
00046     const Smpp::Uint8* ptr = buff;
00047     if(len < 3)
00048         throw Smpp::Error("Invalid command_length");
00049 
00050     Smpp::Uint8 cnt = ptr[octetCount_++];
00051 
00052     for(Uint32 i = 0; i < cnt; ++i) {
00053         Smpp::Uint8 dest_flag = ptr[octetCount_++];
00054         switch(dest_flag) {
00055             case 0x01: // SME Address
00056               {
00057                 SmeAddress smeaddr;
00058                 smeaddr.decode(ptr + octetCount_, len - octetCount_);
00059                 octetCount_ += smeaddr.length();
00060                 if(octetCount_ > len)
00061                     throw Smpp::Error("Invalid command_length");
00062                 this->add(smeaddr);
00063                 break;
00064               }
00065             case 0x02: // Distribution list address
00066               {
00067                 Smpp::String dlname =
00068                         reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff) + octetCount_;
00069                 octetCount_ += dlname.length() + 1; // '\0'
00070                 if(octetCount_ > len)
00071                     throw Smpp::Error("Invalid command_length");
00072                 this->add(dlname);
00073                 break;
00074               }
00075             default:
00076                 throw Smpp::Error("Invalid dest_flag");
00077                 break;
00078         } // switch(...
00079     } // for( ...
00080 }
00081 
00085 void
00086 Smpp::UnsuccessSmeColl::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff, Smpp::Uint32 len) {
00087     const Smpp::Uint8* ptr = static_cast<const Smpp::Uint8*>(buff);
00088     if(len < 1)
00089         throw Smpp::Error("Invalid command_length");
00090 
00091     // first octet in the number of unsuccess (no_unsuccess).
00092     Smpp::Uint8 cnt = ptr[octetCount_++];
00093 
00094     for(Uint32 i = 0; i < cnt; ++i) {
00095         UnsuccessSme addr(ptr + octetCount_, len - octetCount_);
00096         octetCount_ += addr.length();
00097         if(octetCount_ > len)
00098             throw Smpp::Error("Invalid command_length");
00099         this->add(addr);
00100     }
00101 }

00110 void Smpp::chex_dump(const Smpp::Uint8* buff, Smpp::Uint32 len, FILE* file)
00111 {
00112     if(len == 0)
00113         return;
00114 
00115     Smpp::Uint32 i;
00116     for(i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
00117         if(i != 0 && i % 16 == 0) {
00118             fprintf(file, "   ");
00119             for(Smpp::Uint32 j = i - 16; j < i; ++j)
00120                 if(buff[j] > 31 && buff[j] < 128)
00121                     fprintf(file, "%c", static_cast<char>(buff[j]));
00122                 else
00123                     fprintf(file, ".");
00124             fprintf(file, "\n");
00125         }
00126 
00127         fprintf(file, "%02x ", buff[i]);
00128     }
00129 
00130     Smpp::Uint32 m = i % 16 ? 16 - i % 16 : 0; // octets needed to make up 16
00131     m && fprintf(file, "%*c", m * 3, ' ');
00132     fprintf(file, "   ");
00133     for(Smpp::Uint32 j = i % 16 ? i - i % 16 : i - 16 ; j < i; ++j)
00134         if(buff[j] > 31 && buff[j] < 128)
00135             fprintf(file, "%c", static_cast<char>(buff[j]));
00136         else
00137             fprintf(file, ".");
00138 
00139     fprintf(file, "\n");
00140     fflush(file);
00141 }

00150 void Smpp::hex_dump(const Smpp::Uint8* buff, Smpp::Uint32 len, std::ostream& os)
00151 {
00152     if(len == 0)
00153         return;
00154 
00155     Smpp::Uint32 i;
00156     for(i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
00157         if(i != 0 && i % 16 == 0) {
00158             os << "   ";
00159             for(Smpp::Uint32 j = i - 16; j < i; ++j)
00160                 if(buff[j] > 31 && buff[j] < 128)
00161                     os << static_cast<char>(buff[j]);
00162                 else
00163                     os << ".";
00164             os << "\n";
00165         }
00166 
00167         os << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0')
00168            << std::hex << (int)buff[i] << std::dec << ' ';
00169     }
00170 
00171     Smpp::Uint32 m = i % 16 ? 16 - i % 16 : 0;// octets needed to make up 16
00172     m && os << std::setw(m*3) << std::setfill(' ') << ' ';
00173 
00174     os << "   ";
00175     for(Smpp::Uint32 j = i % 16 ? i - i % 16 : i - 16 ; j < i; ++j)
00176         if(buff[j] > 31 && buff[j] < 128)
00177             os << static_cast<char>(buff[j]);
00178         else
00179             os << ".";
00180 
00181     os << "\n";
00182     std::flush(os);
00183 }
